channel.title: [Neutral killer] The Cutthroat
channel.description: >**The Cutthroat** Neutral killing **Passive: Spree** If you successfully killed someone the previous night, you will be immune to death. If you successfully killed someone each night for the last 3 nights, you will be immune to occupation. If you successfully killed someone each night for the last 5 nights, you will be immune to visits. **Passive: Criminal record** Immune to death nights 1 and 2 **Night ability: Slay** Kill your target. If you successfully killed someone each night for the last two nights, this will bypass death immunity. If you successfully killed someone each night for the last four nights, you will kill your target and all their visitors.

item.title: [Neutral killer] The Cutthroat
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
no, i think you should get rid of continuous, infinite use, immunity pierce all together

Read full topic

item.title: [Neutral killer] The Cutthroat
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
should I switch them up? (I.E pierce immunity after nights, kill visitors after 2)

Read full topic

item.title: [Neutral killer] The Cutthroat
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
I’d say get rid of immunity-piercing attacks, because that basically makes it impossible to stop him after 3 kills in a row. Or maybe make it an activated day ability (with limited uses)
Keep the attack all visitors though, I think that’s nice

Read full topic

item.title: [Neutral killer] The Cutthroat
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
The Cutthroat
Neutral killing
Passive: Spree
If you successfully killed someone the previous night, you will be immune to death. If you successfully killed someone each night for the last 3 nights, you will be immune to occupation. If you successfully killed someone each night for the last 5 nights, you will be immune to visits.
Passive: Criminal record
Immune to death nights 1 and 2
Night ability: Slay
Kill your target. If you successfully killed someone each night for the last two nights, this will bypass death immunity. If you successfully killed someone each night for the last four nights, you will kill your target and all their visitors.

Read full topic
